channel.title: Whirlwind Wheelchair
channel.description: A non-profit social enterprise dedicated to improving the lives of people with disabilities in the developing world while also promoting sustainable local economic development

item.title: Demo RoughRider Available at Riekes Center
item.dc:creator: Israel Curtis
item.description: Hey there Bay Area – Wondering if the RoughRider is right for you? Now you can find out! The Riekes Center in Palo Alto has a 17” demo RoughRider available to check-out, just ask to speak to Sharon. Try it out and see if it’s right for you!
item.content:encoded: Hey there Bay Area – Wondering if the RoughRider is right for you?  Now you can find out!  The Riekes Center in Palo Alto has a 17” demo RoughRider available to check-out, just ask to speak to Sharon.  Try it out and see if it’s right for you!
